function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inefficient dissemination of evidence to target audiences","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proliferation of misinformation and fake news on social media platforms during pandemics","category":"Participants","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Weak collaboration among relevant stakeholders in disseminating evidence during pandemics","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Scarcity of relevant research and actionable evidence during pandemics","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited utilization of evidence in decision-making in low and middle-income countries.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poor communication between researchers and decision-makers.","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Corruption, institutional constraints, and weak mechanisms to support evidence-informed decision-making.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Home quarantine creating social and psychological challenges due to long stays at home and isolation","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate living space and facilities for remote work and study, leading to increased stress and reduced productivity.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Extended periods at home during quarantine","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Psychological impact and discontent among residents due to lack of preparation for epidemics in residential buildings","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Need for additional spaces in apartments to support pandemic-resilient living","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited outdoor spaces","category":"Family","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate space for social distancing and home quarantine","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of domestic green spaces and natural views","category":"Family","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unintended adverse effects of covid-19 containment measures on mental and physical health","category":"Visitors","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social isolation and lockdown affecting mental health with symptoms of post-traumatic stress, fear, anxiety, and depression.","category":"Visitors","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adequate open green spaces for outdoor recreation and exercise in some cities.","category":"Visitors","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High cost of implementing vertical gardens in housing levels","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close physical interaction with live plants in home gardening may facilitate the transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased physical interaction with outdoor spaces such as balconies may contribute to the spread of airborne diseases.","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of contagious diseases from close physical interaction with live plants","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of exposure to noise pollution impacting mental health","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate housing conditions for low-and middle-income people","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Socio-economic gap in housing levels","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poor distribution of housing units","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of sustainable architectural and urban design","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate housing environment","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Economic gap and housing costs","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate housing conditions contributing to the spread of contagious diseases, including covid-19, due to lack of safety and healthy environments.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adequate quarantine facilities and isolation spaces within housing environments, leading to uncontrolled transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to address the housing needs of marginalized groups, leading to increased vulnerability to contagious diseases and public health disparities.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in population density due to movement toward urban areas","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Barriers restricting movement of labor and population due to long-term relief measures","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unintended inefficiencies in the housing sector due to long-term relief measures","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Housing insecurity leading to mental health issues such as chronic mental disorders, depression, psychological distress, anxiety, and suicide.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase in demand for larger homes and outdoor spaces may lead to overcrowding and reduced physical distancing, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decline in demand for affordable housing may lead to displacement and overcrowding in lower-income communities, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on housing prices","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regional differences in housing preferences","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on real estate markets","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Higher infection rates linked to lower housing conditions","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on housing market prices","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in home size and extra bedrooms in densely populated areas","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate attention to social aspects in residential building assessment tools","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient coverage of waste and wastewater management in assessment tools","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gaps in pandemic resilience in global assessment tools breeam, casbee, leed, well","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for pandemic-resilient design elements in residential buildings","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate integration of sustainability and pandemic resilience goals in residential building design","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"}]}
